tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The ship sailed from Italian city and spent ten days en route. Then, it arrived at port #6.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Find the end point of the appropriate route.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: Route from Naples: Athens, Lisbon, Antwerp, Amsterdam, London, Dover. Take films with letters DOVER and attach to the envelope #2.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The crossword puzzle indicates the suspect in the photograph.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The suspect who is wearing a hat is Frank Wilson.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Filled IDs have fold lines.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Fold the blank ID template along the fold line to reveal the letter.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The suspect is Carlo Ricci.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Place the magnifying glass on the wardrobe doors and read the words in a circle.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Find an object in the open wardrobe that matches the colour on the door.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Identify the name of the cabin occupant who owns the following items: trap, gun, binoculars, and knife.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The suspect is Robert Hunter.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Draw images of a waning moon, a pencil, a hammer, and a slingshot.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The waning moon has a shape that is similar to the letter C.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The suspect connected with a city is Jack London.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Do the wooden puzzle to get a three-by-three grid.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Determine what shape the person from the passenger list should be in the last cell.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The suspect is Steven Murray.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Find five suspects on the list and assign the alphabet letter according to the numbering.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is BINGO. Take films with the letters BINGO and attach to the envelope #3.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Insert the wooden tokens of the suspects into the ship layout to understand the correspondence of names and cabins.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: List all suspects on the table based on the concierge notes and the location of the people in the cabins.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: See Suspects details below.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: There are letters below the cabins on the ship. Cross out two innocent people.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is TRY. Take films with the letters TRY and attach to the envelope #4.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Examine the evidence board with a red lens magnifying glass.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Place clues on the board: number on the clue = number on the board that can be seen through a magnifying glass.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Connect lines of evidence belonging to each individual suspect.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Lines form letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is COP. Take films with the letters COP and attach to the envelope #5.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Only one suspect can go to the crime scene without witnesses along the way.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Follow the right path to collect the letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is CRIME. Take films with the letters CRIME and attach to the envelope #6.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Use the box and word card to create a set expression.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Think outside the box.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Write a set expression in the circles on the box lid.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Selected circles form a word.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is NEXT. Take films with the letters NEXT and attach to the envelope #7.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Use the magnifying glass.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Place the magnifying glass on the compass and turn to match the direction of the route.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Letters are visible in the hole in the handle of the magnifier. Desired directions - NE, N, E, SE.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is BALI.
